description:
Deals with key aspects of business strategy formulation & implementation, providing Australian & international perspective. Examines concepts, theories & techniques relevant to this task drawn from many disciplines.
Note - this course MUST be undertaken at UQ. Students are not permitted to undertake the course on exchange or at another Australian or overseas institution (either cross-institutionally or for credit).
incompatible: MEBS7090 or MGTS7090 or 7303 or 7705 or 7803
